name: Smash Court - Warm Up
description:
It's finally here! The fast-paced tennis duel with realistic, extremely true-to-life physics simulation, outstanding sound effects and merciless CPU opponents!

Compete with your friends locally on a computer, or dare a match against the CPU opponent.

  • Hit the ball just before it reaches the player. Then your strokes will become more powerful.
  • You'll notice a special sound when hitting perfectly.
  • Every perfect hit increases the speed of your strokes up to a maximum. A normal hit will decrease the speed a little.
  • There are two positions: LEFT and RIGHT. When pressing (not holding) a direction button, the player will move to that position if not already there.
  • When the ball is approaching and is within a short distance to the player, the direction buttons will trigger a hit (not a movement). But be careful! It is possible to press too early.
